quotes.title: Crazy
quotes.text: The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.title: Ideas
quotes.text: Ideas are just a multiplier of execution.
quotes.author: Derek Sivers

quotes.title: The Art of War
quotes.text: If you know the enemy and know yourself, you need not fear the result of a hundred battles.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.title: Different
quotes.text: Every person has different qualities. Do not try to change them, learn to respect them.
quotes.author: Me on 13th Dec, 2014

quotes.title: The Last Samurai
quotes.text: There is so much here I will never understand. I've never been a church going man, and what I've seen on the field of battle has led me to question God's purpose. But there is indeed something spiritual in this place. And though it may forever be obscure to me, I cannot but be aware of its power.
quotes.author: Nathan Algren
